THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON

09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE

FOLLOWING:

ORDER
Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. The petitioner is one of the accused in SC No.
1357 of 2013 on the file of the Special Court
for the Trial of CBI Cases,
Thiruvananthapuram. He has filed Annexure-IV
application under Section 227 Cr.P.C. for his
discharge. The only request in this Crl.M.C.
is to direct the trial court to dispose it of
expeditiously.

3. After hearing both sides, I am satisfied that
the request is reasonable.

4. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of
directing the trial court to dispose of
Annexure-IV application as expeditiously as
possible. The learned Sessions Judge shall
only look into the materials relied on by the

ci Roe

investigating officer in support of the final
